FileSystemContentProvider

public FileSystemContentProvider()
Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize()
                throws Exception
forces FileSystemSource to load all plugin FileHandlers. Also, forces the CatalogModel to load a FileSystemonnection on startup. This is useful for non-user interface applications to ensure the plugins are loaded. Another way to achieve this is by calling CatalogModel.initialize()

Specified by:
initialize in interface ContentProvider
Overrides:
initialize in class BaseContentProvider
Exception
See Also:
BaseContentProvider.getRootClosedIconResource(), BaseContentProvider.getRootOpenIconResource()

getRootPath

public String getRootPath()
indicates file system disks should be placed in the top-level folder directly underneath the Catalog root folder

Specified by:
getRootPath in interface ContentProvider
Overrides:
getRootPath in class BaseContentProvider
Returns:
null == the root path for file system
